actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to reestablish the fiscal integrity of the Government of the United States, through the establishment of controls with respect to the levels of its revenues and budget outlays, by reducing the wages and other emoluments of Members of Congress in any fiscal year in which Government budget outlays exceed revenues.

summary.text: Congressional Fiscal Integrity Act - Provides for the establishment of controls with respect to the levels of budget outlays of the United States. Requires the reducing of wages and other emoluments of Members of Congress in any fiscal year in which Government budget outlays exceed revenues.

titles.title: A bill to reestablish the fiscal integrity of the Government of the United States, through the establishment of controls with respect to the levels of its revenues and budget outlays, by reducing the wages and other emoluments of Members of Congress in any fiscal year in which Government budget outlays exceed revenues.
